section.p: The Immunization Medication Information represents product information about the immunization substance. The vaccine manufacturer and vaccine lot number are typically recorded in the medical record and should be included if known.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-9004, CONF:1098-10499, CONF:1098-32602 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Immunization Medication Information template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial such that it (CONF:1098-9006)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CVX Vaccines Administered - Vaccine Set 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.6 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-9007)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] lotNumberText (CONF:1098-9014, DSTU:995)
Note: lotNumberText should be included if known.
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Immunization Medication Information template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MANU" (CONF:9002, R2.0=CONF:1098-9002)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:9005, R2.0=CONF:1098-9005)

SHOULD contain [0..1] manufacturerOrganization such that it (CONF:9012, R2.0=CONF:1098-9012)
Conforms to Organization from CDA

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial such that it (CONF:1098-9006)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CVX Vaccines Administered - Vaccine Set 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.6 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-9007)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] lotNumberText (CONF:1098-9014, DSTU:995)
Note: lotNumberText should be included if known.
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

body.codeblock: <manufacturedproduct xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="MANU"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="956476422"/> <manufacturedMaterial> <code codeSystemName=""/> <lotNumberText>TEXT FOR LOT NUMBER TEXT</lotNumberText> </manufacturedMaterial> </manufacturedproduct>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:9004, CONF:10499 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54"
SHALL conform to CDA Manufactured Product
Consol Immunization Medication Information SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MANU" (CONF:9002, R2.0=CONF:1098-9002)
Consol Immunization Medication Information MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:9005, R2.0=CONF:1098-9005)
Consol Immunization Medication Information SHOULD contain [0..1] manufacturerOrganization such that it (CONF:9012, R2.0=CONF:1098-9012) Conforms to Organization from CDA
Consol Immunization Medication Information SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial, where its type is Immunization Medication Information Manufactured Material (CONF:9006)
Consol Immunization Medication Information Manufactured Material code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:9008)
Consol Immunization Medication Information Manufactured Material originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15555)
Consol Immunization Medication Information Manufactured Material reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15556)

Consol Immunization Medication Information Manufactured Material reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15557)
Consol Immunization Medication Information Manufactured Material code MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:9011)
SHALL conform to CDA Material

Consol Immunization Medication Information Manufactured Material SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Vaccine Administered Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:9007)
Consol Immunization Medication Information Manufactured Material SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] lotNumberText (CONF:9014)
